00051 void cTexturedParticle::draw() {
00052         
00053         glColor3fv(colour);
00054         glPushMatrix();
00055         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00056         if (texture != NULL) texture->bind();
00057         glScalef(size, size, size);
00058         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00059         glTexCoord2f(0,0);
00060          glVertex3f (position[0],position[1],position[2]);
00061          
00062         glTexCoord2f(1,0);
00063          glVertex3f (position[0]+size,position[1],position[2]);
00064          
00065         glTexCoord2f(1,1);
00066          glVertex3f (position[0]+size,position[1]+size,position[2]);
00067          
00068         glTexCoord2f(0,1);
00069          glVertex3f (position[0],position[1]+size,position[2]);
00070         glEnd();
00071         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00072         glPopMatrix();
00073 }
